full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA CIG MKHA' 'GRO SNYAN RGYUD KYI LAM ZAB RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR SHIN TU 'KHYER BDE BAR BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES MA CIG MKHA' 'GRO SNYAN BRGYUD KYI LAM ZAB RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR SHIN TU 'KHYER BDER BKOD PA 'DI NI YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA BYAMS PA 'PHRIN LAS DAR RGYAS KYI ZHAB RDUL SPYI BOR LEN PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG CHOS MED SNYOMS LAS CAN BYAMS PA LHA DBANG RIG 'DZIN GYIS RANG NYID KHA 'DON BYA BA'I CHED DU SHIN TU MYUR BAR SBYAR BA'O, ,)
